trans-unit.source: Represents a property stored in a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma propriedade armazenada num <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A StylusPointProperty represents properties in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> such as the (x, y) coordinates, pressure, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Um StylusPointProperty representa propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>como (x, y) coordenadas, pressão e assim sucessivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from the StylusPointProperty class to customize the information stored for each property.
trans-unit.target: Pode herdar da classe de StylusPointProperty para personalizar as informações armazenadas para cada propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Presentation Framework ships with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> class that inherits from StylusPointProperty and specifies the minimum and maximum values, resolution, and unit used for each property.
trans-unit.target: O Windows Presentation Framework é fornecido com o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>classe que herda de StylusPointProperty e especifica os valores mínimos e máximos, resolução e unidade utilizada para cada propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> class, copying the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> classe, copiar especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> class using the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> classe utilizando o GUID especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the property represents a button on the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a propriedade representa um botão de caneta; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o GUID para o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> represents a button on the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> representa um botão de caneta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> represents a button on the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> representa um botão de caneta; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que representa o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o objeto atual.
